key.name: tab-layout
key.description: Decide on the layout tabs should be on a new window

key.name: tab-autohide
key.description: Hide tab interface when only one tab is in a window

key.name: download-domain
key.description: When downloading files to default directory create a folder named after the page domain it came from and save it there

key.name: planc-init
key.description: Has user started the program and initialized defaults

key.name: planc-inhibit
key.summary: Inhibit idle behaviour during audio playback
key.description: Do not allow a screensaver to start or the screen to blank while the current tab is playing audio

key.name: webkit-cache
key.description: Is Memory Cache enabled. Memory Cache (not to be confused with Disk Cache) keeps pages suspended in memory to accellerate the process of navigating back/forward between them. Users with low system memory and/or high disk I/O performance should consider disabling this option. Enabled by default for performance.

key.name: webkit-encoding
key.description: The type of encoding to text encoding to use when webkit has no hints from metadata

key.name: webkit-hw
key.description: Should webkit allow hardware accelleration

key.name: webkit-java
key.description: Is Java allowed to run. Is Java (not to be confused with JavaScript) allowed to be executed by webkit. Disable by default for security.

key.name: webkit-js
key.description: Is JavaScript allowed to run. Is JavaScript (not to be confused with Java) allowed to be executed by webkit. JavaScript has become the defacto scripting language in HTML5. Disabling this option may make some websites not display correctly. This is a master switch, disabling this feature will override all settings in the application that contradict it. If you want to disable/enable JavaScript on certian domains use configure Domain Policies within Plan C. Enabled by default for compatibility.

key.name: webkit-mse
key.description: Is Media Source Extensions enabled. MSE allows a websites player to deliver blobs of multimedia content though JavaScript. Disabled by default for stability and security.

key.name: webkit-eme
key.description: Is Encrypted Media Extensions enabled. EME allows JavaScript to be used for playing encrypted media in HTML. Disabled by default due to controversial nature of the standard.

key.name: webkit-webaudio
key.description: Is WebAudio enabled. WebAudio allows webpages to generate Audio WAVE data from JavaScript. Disabled by default for stability.

key.name: webkit-rtc
key.description: Is WebRTC enabled or not. WebRTC allows websites to get multimedia input from periphrals such as a microphone or webcam. Disabled by default for privacy.

key.name: webkit-ppt
key.description: Is webkit running each tab in it's own process. PPT segregates each tab from the others. In the event a tab crashes or freezes, it will not effect other tabs but this comes at the cost of additional memory overhead. This setting will not take effect until program restart. Disabled by default for resource management.

key.name: webkit-mcm
key.description: How should webkit handle caching content

key.name: webkit-plugins
key.description: Is webkit allowed to run third party plugins. Plugins are small programs that are embedded into webpages to provide functionality that can't (or could not when the page was developed) be achieved though standard web technoligies. Disabled by default for security.

key.name: webkit-dev
key.description: Enable Webkit Inspector

key.name: planc-traditional
key.description: Force Plan C to use the traditional full menu even if the desktop enviroment handles a Gmenu

key.name: planc-search-implicit
key.description: Allow addressbar requests that look like a search to be handled by the default search engine

key.name: planc-tabs-hover
key.description: Switch when hovering over an entry in the tabs menu

key.name: planc-forward-unknown-protocol
key.summary: Forward unknown protocol links to the operating system
key.description: Try send any uri protocol that webkit can't understand to the system automatically in the hopes that an assigned application will deal with it intelligently

key.name: planc-compact-toolbar
key.description: Use a compact toolbar interface that intergrates most controls into the header

key.name: planc-history-clean
key.description: Decide how often to clean out the history database

key.name: planc-startpage
key.description: The page to load on browser start

key.name: planc-homepage
key.description: The page to go to when home is clicked

key.name: tab-newpage
key.description: The page to load in a new tab when none is specified

key.name: planc-search
key.description: The search engine to use when no key is specified
